籤詩版本二:
Jiifka keega ayaa midab badan leh, nasiibkuna wuxuu keenaa nasiib wacan iyo nasiib wacan.
Dadkii waagaas jiray waa in aanay ka shallaayin in ay ka daahdeen in ay sumcad helaan, waxa ay caan ka noqdeen adduunka oo dhan hal mar.
詩意:
Hexagramkani waa kan keega dul saaran.
Nasiib wacan wax walba.
解曰: Duqdu waxay noqotaa mid cusub. U dir alaabta dhammaatay. Haddaba hammigiisa nololeed. Wax walba waa qaddar.
籤詩故事一:
Liang Haodengke
Aqoonyahan, Liang Hao (963-1004), magaca sharafta leh ee Taisu, wuxuu ku dhashay Xucheng, Yunzhou (hadda Dongping, Shandong) ee Boqortooyada Song.
Intii uu xukunka hayay Yongxi, waxa uu ku guulaystay imtixaankii Jinshi isagoo siddeed iyo toban jir ah. Sii wadida codsiga imtixaanka ayaa ku guuldareystay.
Waxa uu bilaabay in uu galo imtixaanka sanadkii saddexaad ee Tianfu, waxa uu ku baasi jiray imtixaanka sanad walba xilliyadii boqortooyadii dambe ee Han iyo boqortooyadii dambe ee Zhou, balse sanad walba wuu dhici jiray. Wuxuu ku dhaartay inaan la heshiin doonin haddii uusan ku guuleysan abaalmarinta koowaad.
Markii uu da'diisu ahayd laba iyo siddeetan sano, sannadkii labaad ee xukunka Yongxi ee Emperor Zhenzong ee Boqortooyada Song, wuxuu ku guuleystay abaalmarinta koowaad.
聖意: U soo ducee amniga guriga (wanaagsan), badbaadada shakhsi ahaaneed, faa'iido dhaqaale, macaamil ganacsi, guur, Lujia ragga lugeynaya, Chitian silkworms, siddeed dhibcood, lix neef, raadinta dadka, dacwooyinka dadweynaha, tahriibka, hantida lumay, cudurrada waqooyi-galbeed, Fushan faa'iidada qabriga
